1. Install BeepBoop app first
2. Open BeepBoop
3. Tap "Request Permissions"
4. Grant both Read and Send permissions

Permissions allow this app to send messages through BeepBoop.
Send messages automatically using Tasker actions:

Action: SEND_MESSAGE
Extra: roomId:!your:room.id:server.com
Extra: message:Hello from Tasker!
Target: Broadcast Receiver
Package: com.github.quickreactor.beepboop
The app will receive your broadcast and send the message through BeepBoop. Make sure permissions are granted first!

BeepBoop needs permissions from Beeper:

• Read Permission – View your chat list and rooms
• Send Permission – Send messages through your Beeper account

You'll now see Android's permission dialog. Please approve both permissions to continue.

Note: You'll also need to disable battery optimization (from the Help screen) to ensure messages send reliably in the background.
